name: Santa vs Krampus (Aaron King, CurryIs2Hot4U, Joseph Dasilva)
name_original: Santa vs Krampus (Aaron King, CurryIs2Hot4U, Joseph Dasilva)
description:
This is a two player game with one playing as Santa and the other playing as Krampus. Santa is attempting to deliver gifts to all the chimneys in the village, while Krampus uses their tricks to try and catch them before they can do so. Don't worry though, Santa has a couple tricks up their sleeve as well to keep Krampus off their back.

------------------------------

Credits:

Joseph Dasilva

Aaron King

Udayan Senapati
